_header: Now I have that I nolde
_description: To save the soul — nine irregular lines written as prose in a sermon collection

BLAdd11579.Transcription:
Nw ych habbe þat y noldeAnd y ne habbe þat y
                    woldeCrist me bi nime þat ich habbeAnd me sende þat y ne
                    habbeme ys wooSo y sike for milif þat al y falwe þer y
                    goo
BLAdd11579.Note:
Written as prose, with rubrication to mark the beginning of
                    lines.
